title: Brahmins have reservation?
selftext:
https://www.thehindu.com/news/national/kerala/brahmin-meet-concludes-vowing-to-uphold-sanatana-dharma/article67341913.ece

There is a by line to the headline that reads "
Meet also calls upon Brahmin youth to progress without taking the benefit of reservation". 

Does this mean brahmin's have reservation?
comments: There's a 10% reservation for economically weaker section who doesn't belong to obc groups. This should apply to Brahmins as well.
economically weaker = upto 8 Lakhs p.a. income.
cleaned_text: brahmins reservation line headline reads meet also calls upon brahmin youth progress without taking benefit reservation mean brahmins reservation
cleaned_selftext: line headline reads meet also calls upon brahmin youth progress without taking benefit reservation mean brahmins reservation
cleaned_comments: theres reservation economically weaker section doesnt belong obc groups apply brahmins well economically weaker upto lakhs pa income
